title: Data Lakehouse
subtext: Combine data lakes and warehouses for comprehensive storage
author: Buzzpy

description.title: Data Lakehouse
texts: A Data Lakehouse combines the features of data lakes and data warehouses to provide structured and unstructured data storage and analytics capabilities.
Think of a Data Lakehouse as a hybrid home that offers both the vast storage space of a warehouse and the relaxing, fluid environment of a lake.
